concept.title: Connect to Git with SSH Keys

conbody.p: To connect to Git with SSH keys, see Git Integration Authentication with SSH Keys.

li.p: Currently, the Git integration in supports SSH SHA-1, RSA-1024 and RSA-2048 private keys. Since GitHub has dropped the support for DSA and RSA SHA-1, you cannot integrate Katalon Studio with GitHub via SSH. You can still integrate with other cloud-hosted services of Git, such as GitLab, BitBucket, and Microsoft Azure DevOps.
The workaround for this issue is to use:

ul.li: HTTPS protocol with GitHub personal access token. See Connect to Git with HTTPS.
